text: Munich Animation is a German Animation studio based in Munich, Germany. It produces traditional and CGI animation for feature films, short films, television, advertising and games. The studio's notable features include The Fearless Four and Help! I'm a Fish. == Filmography == Note: This section only lists films entirely produced by the company. * Der große Kater (2010) * Wo ist Fred? (2006) === Traditionally animated films === * The Simpsons Movie (2007) * Pooh's Heffalump Movie (2005) * Piglet's Big Movie (2003) * Jester Till (2003) * The Powerpuff Girls Movie (2002) * Hey Arnold!: The Movie (2002) * The Shark and the Piano (2001) - Short * Help! I'm a Fish (2000) * Tobias and His Lion (1999) * The Fearless Four (1997) == References == == External links == * Jester Till (Munich Animation), A compositing example excerpted from Jester Till. title: Munich Animation
